title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 207.16 - Filing the arbitrator's invoice
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 207.16 - Filing the arbitrator's invoice

State Regulations

Upon completion of the assignment, the arbitrator shall
submit to the director of conciliation a copy of the invoice submitted to the
parties showing a detailed accounting of fees and expenses (if
any). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
207.16

Amended

New

York State Register August 2, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 31, eff. 8/2/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
